content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs. However, it is likely that some businesses and corporations might resist the changes proposed by Bernie Sanders to address income inequality. These changes could potentially increase costs for businesses, such as higher taxes and wages, which could affect their profits. Additionally, some companies may view policies that prioritize workers over shareholders as a threat to their bottom line. 

However, there may also be businesses and corporations that support these changes and recognize the importance of addressing income inequality for the long-term health and stability of the economy. Ultimately, the extent of resistance to these changes would likely vary depending on the specific policies proposed, the industries affected, and the economic and political climate at the time.
